title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: The bug report states that when using the 'ajc' command with the 'outjar' parameter, a jar file is created without a MANIFEST.MF file inside. The user expects that a valid jar file should be created with the MANIFEST.MF file included.
OB: When I execute the command 'ajc sourceroots <mydir> outjar <my.jar>', an output file is created with a .jar extension. However, upon inspecting the file, I noticed that it does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: I expect that when using the 'outjar' option with 'ajc', a valid jar file should be created with a MANIFEST.MF file inside.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Execute the command 'ajc sourceroots <mydir> outjar <my.jar>'.
2. Verify the contents of the generated <my.jar> file.
3. Confirm that the <my.jar> does not contain the MANIFEST.MF file.
